name: reskins-bobs
title: Artisanal Reskins: Bob's Mods
author: Kirazy
description: [BETA] Reskins items, entities, and structures within Bob's mods to add tier coloring with player-customizable colors. Features high resolution icons, new, replacement sprites and models for many entities, and artisanal, hand crafted color masks, among other improvements. Part of the Artisanal Reskins series. Supports custom tier coloring for Miniloader, Loader Redux, Vanilla Loaders HD, and Deadlock's Crating and Beltboxes. May be used with ShinyBobsGFX and ShinyAngelGFX.
